target: What pastries have you baked in the past?
src:
You have applied for the job as baker. What do you think is interesting about this work?
I think it is interesting to learn locally baked French pastries.

target: What do you think is your greatest skill?
src:
What makes you a good fit?
I have all the skills and experience listed in the job description.

target: Awesome. What is your main task as a part of that team?
src:
If you are going to work as a baker, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I had been a part of the production team in a cafe before. We are composed of three production bakers.

target: Some other tasks that you can potentially take over include mentoring your acquaintances.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
Aside from baking pastries, what other tasks should I expect to take over?

target: Why do you like baking training?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
My best experience is being able to attend free baking training every year.

target: What are the usual people you encounter in your last job?
src:
You have applied for the job as a healthcare worker. What do you think is interesting about this work?
I think it is interesting to meet new people and keep them company until they get better.

target: How long have you worked at that hospital?
src:
What makes you a good fit?
I think I am a good fit because I worked at a hospital before.

target: Great. What type of patients are you helping with?
src:
If you are going to work in the healthcare industry, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
When I worked as a healthcare assistant, I worked with patients. I helped them with their basic hygiene activities.

target: We have open healthcare assistant jobs for pediatrics, maternity, and geriatrics right now. You will be assigned to the ward that is most relevant to your skills and experience.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
Is there an open job position in the pediatric ward? If ever, can I help out there?

target: Sounds interesting. What job role have you played while working there?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
When I did volunteer work for malnourished children in Asia.

target: What are you most experienced in cars, the electric-powered or gasoline-powered?
src:
You have applied for the job as car mechanic. What do you think is interesting about this work?
I'm passionate about cars. It's interesting to know that I can help people to save their cars.

target: How many car owners do you interview a day?
src:
If you are going to work in our car shop, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
Yes. I am working directly with the car owners so they can describe their problematic encounters to me.

target: Yes. You will sign-up for at least one year of the work contract agreement.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
Am I going to work on a contract basis?

target: How did you do in that competition?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
When my past employer holds an annual car mechanic competition to repair a car.

target: What store duties have you done before?
src:
You have applied for the job as a retail worker. What do you think is interesting about this job?
It's interesting to keep the store always neat and organized. Eye pleasing to the customers.

target: What duty do you partake on stock delivery?
src:
If you are going to work in our shop, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I worked with delivery teams on my past retail job before.

target: Yes. We will train you basic things about the shop regardless of your experience in the past.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
Do you offer on-the-job training?

target: What did you like about team building?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
My best experience is when the company I worked for in the past arranges team building every year.

target: Do you have experience doing inventory work on a computer or manually?
src:
You have applied for the job as a warehouse hand. What do you think is interesting about this work?
I like to work on administrative tasks in inventory controls.

target: How did you cooperate with your warehouse manager at that time?
src:
If you are going to work in our warehouse, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I worked closely with the warehouse manager on my previous work.

target: The minimum shift is six hours a day while on busy days can go up to eight hours a day.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
How long are the shifts?

target: How did you work as a mailman?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
When I worked as a mailman. I got a lot of exercise during my work day.

target: How long did you drive on a day on your past job? (if any)
src:
You have applied for the job as a truck driver. What do you think is interesting about this job?
I like driving long roads.

target: Are you comfortable working with a codriver?
src:
If you are going to work at our cargo company, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
Yes. I have a codriver working with me where we exchange shifts during more than eight-hour-long drives.

target: The job requires you to work for five days a week.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
How many days a week should I work?

target: Great. What else does your past employer give as a great offer to you back then?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
The best experience in my past job is when my employer takes care of our lodging when we do very long-hour drives.

target: What physical jobs have you done before?
src:
You have applied for the job as a warehouse hand. What do you think is interesting about this work?
I like to do more physically active jobs than clerical jobs.

target: What is your duty as part of your team?
src:
If you are going to work in our warehouse, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
Yes. I am a part of a warehouse team.

target: We have ten vacant jobs open. If you like, you can refer a friend.
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
How many vacant jobs do you have right now?

target: What other jobs did you have in the past?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
I like doing physically active jobs because I feel healthy.

target: What is your working schedule in your past job look like?
src:
You have applied for the job as a truck driver. What do you think is interesting about this job?
It offers a steady paycheck and regular delivery schedules for me.

target: That is good. What does a usual conversation like between you and the people who receive orders?
src:
If you are going to work at our cargo company, it is good if you have experience from working with others. Can you tell me a little if you have such experience?
I usually drive trucks alone but I interact with people who receive the orders.

target: We both have open jobs for regular workers and on-call workers. Which one do you prefer?
src:
Is there anything you want to ask about this job?
Is this a regular job or an on-call job?

target: What brand manufacturer of trucks had you driven before?
src:
What is your best experience from your previous jobs?
Their trucks are always in good condition and undergo regular maintenance.
